message.description: The error message in a string format (https://docs.feathersjs.com/middleware/error-handling.html)

className.description: A CSS class name that can be handy for styling errors based on the error type. (https://docs.feathersjs.com/middleware/error-handling.html)

data.description: Object that may contain additional data (https://docs.feathersjs.com/middleware/error-handling.html)

errors.description: Object that may contain additional info about the error (https://docs.feathersjs.com/middleware/error-handling.html)
